name: Lodgix.com Vacation Rental Website Builder
author: Lodgix

sections.description:
This version of the plugin is still being maintained, however we have released a new version (2.0) which offers some incredible new improvements including:
* Mapping
* Favorites
* Quoting
* Customizable Search Bar / Search Widget
* Featured Rentals Widget
* Native support for Elementor, Beaver Builder, Avada Live, etc.
* Modern, mobile friendly designs
* Multilingual!
* Much, much more!

The new plugin can be downloaded and installed from our website here:
https://www.lodgix.com/vacation-rental-wordpress/

For some great links to recently launched sites that are powered by v2.0 of the Lodgix plugin please visit:
https://blog.lodgix.com/portfolio/

The Lodgix.com Vacation Rental Website Builder makes building a dynamic, great looking vacation rental website very easy. The plugin will create a searchable / sortable listing interface for all rentals with a variety of customization options. For those with more advanced styling skills, the plugin has been designed to allow for easy styling through the application of custom css.

Lodgix.com Features

  • Integration with Airbnb, HomeAway, Flipkey, TripAdvisor, Booking.com and Expedia.
  • Automated emails / texts to your guests, owners and staff.
  • Owner statement generation w/ optional owner logins.
  • Automatic inventory management â€“ when a property is booked, it is marked as unavailable across all channels and your website.
  • Integrated digital contracts and signatures.
  • Integrated to MailChimp for email marketing.
  • Advanced reporting including revenue, taxes, advance deposits, payments and comparative revenue.
  • Length of stay and last minute discounts and coupon codes.
  • Great looking multi-property and single-property booking calendars can be embedded into your website or blog.
  • Integrated to Stripe.com and Authorize.net.
  • iCal importing and exporting.

Updating your website has never been easier! Update your property on Lodgix.com and within minutes those changes will appear on your website as well as our network of channel partners like Airbnb and VRBO.

Visitors to your vacation rental website can view property images, videos, Matterport virtual tours, rates and policies as well as check availability, generate quotes and book online.

For a complete listing of features see the complete list of Lodgix.com features and take a product tour.

Try It

Within the plugin are demo credentials for the Lodgix.com API. This will allow the plugin to create a complete working demo on your WordPress site. To setup your own properties on Lodgix.com will require an account. All accounts are free for the first 30 days.
Sign up for a FREE Lodgix account at:
http://www.lodgix.com/pricing

Questions?

If you have any questions about Lodgix or the plugin or just need some help, please feel free to call us at 877-593-2083

and / or read our documentation

Free training or a pre-sales demo can also be scheduled at:
https://calendly.com/lodgix
sections.installation:
1. Install and Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  2. Next go to the settings page for the plugin.
  3. Enable the test credentials or enter your Lodgix.com account credentials
  4. Click the “Save and Regenerate Pages” button at the bottom of the settings page

All of the pages should now have been generated. The remaining items are:

  1. Testing the pages to see if they worked well with your plugin
  2. Reviewing the [plugin documentation] (http://docs.lodgix.com/spaces/vacation-rental/manuals/wordpress-vacation-rental) to configure the additional settings
sections.faq:
Do I need to have the Thesis framework installed to use the Lodgix.com vacation rental management plug-in?

No, the Thesis framework is not mandated to use the plugin. An option is provided within the plugin settings for Thesis compatibility.

What is required to setup the plug-in effectively?

To use this plugin PHP needs to be a minimum version of PHP 5.5.

You will need to obtain a Google Maps API Key.

Additionally the plugin does require a Lodgix.com account. The object of the plugin
is NOT to create a self sufficient vacation rental management and booking application within WordPress.

The object of the plug-in is to allow Lodgix.com customers to quickly and easily sync and display their property inventory on their
website. It really is a sweet plugin that will allow a property owner or designer with WordPress knowledge to build a complete
vacation rental website in a couple hours.

short_description: Build a sophisticated vacation rental website in minutes using vacation rental software from Lodgix.com.
description:
This version of the plugin is still being maintained, however we have released a new version (2.0) which offers some incredible new improvements including:
* Mapping
* Favorites
* Quoting
* Customizable Search Bar / Search Widget
* Featured Rentals Widget
* Native support for Elementor, Beaver Builder, Avada Live, etc.
* Modern, mobile friendly designs
* Multilingual!
* Much, much more!

The new plugin can be downloaded and installed from our website here:
https://www.lodgix.com/vacation-rental-wordpress/

For some great links to recently launched sites that are powered by v2.0 of the Lodgix plugin please visit:
https://blog.lodgix.com/portfolio/

The Lodgix.com Vacation Rental Website Builder makes building a dynamic, great looking vacation rental website very easy. The plugin will create a searchable / sortable listing interface for all rentals with a variety of customization options. For those with more advanced styling skills, the plugin has been designed to allow for easy styling through the application of custom css.

Lodgix.com Features

  • Integration with Airbnb, HomeAway, Flipkey, TripAdvisor, Booking.com and Expedia.
  • Automated emails / texts to your guests, owners and staff.
  • Owner statement generation w/ optional owner logins.
  • Automatic inventory management â€“ when a property is booked, it is marked as unavailable across all channels and your website.
  • Integrated digital contracts and signatures.
  • Integrated to MailChimp for email marketing.
  • Advanced reporting including revenue, taxes, advance deposits, payments and comparative revenue.
  • Length of stay and last minute discounts and coupon codes.
  • Great looking multi-property and single-property booking calendars can be embedded into your website or blog.
  • Integrated to Stripe.com and Authorize.net.
  • iCal importing and exporting.

Updating your website has never been easier! Update your property on Lodgix.com and within minutes those changes will appear on your website as well as our network of channel partners like Airbnb and VRBO.

Visitors to your vacation rental website can view property images, videos, Matterport virtual tours, rates and policies as well as check availability, generate quotes and book online.

For a complete listing of features see the complete list of Lodgix.com features and take a product tour.

Try It

Within the plugin are demo credentials for the Lodgix.com API. This will allow the plugin to create a complete working demo on your WordPress site. To setup your own properties on Lodgix.com will require an account. All accounts are free for the first 30 days.
